channel.title: [RSC]Help
channel.description: Hi, i'm using easyrsc source , and i wanted to change some skills exp ( i know there is control panel where i can change it, but when i put it to 4x then magic and some exp are so high like with 4x exp magic will be 50 with 33 air strikes ) ... well i changed the def.xml files of all skills, compiled but the exp didn't change...so please help...is it compiler? if it is .. could anyone give me a working compiler for easyrsc . Thank You. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 11, 2009, 07:06:53 am[/size][hr]may close it, got it.

item.title: [RSC]Help
item.dc:creator: @siimcarl siimcarl
item.description:
@siimcarl wrote:

Hi, i’m using easyrsc source , and i wanted to change some skills exp ( i know there is control panel where i can change it, but when i put it to 4x then magic and some exp are so high like with 4x exp magic will be 50 with 33 air strikes ) … well i changed the def.xml files of all skills, compiled but the exp didn’t change…so please help…is it compiler? if it is … could anyone give me a working compiler for easyrsc .
Thank You. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 11, 2009, 07:06:53 am[/size][hr]may close it, got it.
